TopicTitle: Annoying Bug after trying 6.4x Kerbol system

Articles.Content:
I have a small problem.It's not a gamebreaking bug,but the KSP keep lowering my warp factor randomly.This bug appeared after i've tried the 6.4x Kerbol System.

I've uninstalled and during a mission(with a new Savegame) i've noticed this small problem.I have many mods installed.

Thanks for your help
Please read the stickied thread and provide additional information.
